title: Red Flag Home | Real Ghost Stories
description:
Today on a frightful episode of Real Ghost Stories Online. 

Should a family have heeded the red flags surrounding the strangely low-priced home they found in their perfect neighborhood. 

None of the other, seemingly comparable homes in the neighborhood were priced this low, so what was it about this one? 

Was there something unseen going on behind the walls, that only those who own the property could experience? 

That’s what we find out today, on real ghost stories online.

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!

To get access to:
